latestReleaseNotes:
### Release info
Purple A11y is available as a desktop app for Mac and Windows. The setup files can be downloaded under `Assets` at the bottom of the page.

### Installation Guide
* Refer to the [Installation Guide](https://github.com/GovTechSG/purple-a11y-desktop/blob/master/INSTALLATION.md) for Windows and Mac.

### What's New
#### New Features
- Option to adhere to robots.txt rules
- Copy error log button to copy error information to clipboard when scan is unable to complete

#### Improvements
- Support basic authentication in sitemap scan
- Compatibility on certain websites by sending host header during URL connectivity check
- Upgrade dependencies
latestPreReleaseNotes:
### Release info
Purple A11y is available as a desktop app for Mac and Windows. The setup files can be downloaded under `Assets` at the bottom of the page.

### Installation Guide
* Refer to the [Installation Guide](https://github.com/GovTechSG/purple-a11y-desktop/blob/master/INSTALLATION.md) for Windows and Mac.

### What's New
#### New Features
- Mobile-friendly report with search functionality

#### Improvements
- Updated dependencies
- Fix a rare issue where UI shows a blank screen
- Fix long waits at Check for Updates screen
